ygData.subject: Re: Re: [archive-crawler] Re: Limit crawling to Markup?
ygData.msgSnippet: The regular expression is wrong in your order.xml file. It should be:

The regular expression is wrong in your order.xml file. It should be:

^.*(?i)\.(bmp|gif|jpe?g|png|tiff|mid|mp2|mp3|mp4|wav|avi|mov|mpeg|ram|rm|smil|wmv|doc|pdf|ppt|swf)$

Give that one a try.

    -tree
